title: Worker Nodes
test_description: Validate that the Databricks cluster has the required worker nodes configuration
parser_code: function aggregateResults(stepResults) { const clusterStep = stepResults.get_cluster_info; const expected_result = `Worker Nodes: ${(typeof variables !== 'undefined' && variables.iq_104_1_worker_count) || 8} x ${((typeof variables !== 'undefined' && variables.iq_104_1_node_type) || 'E32ds v5').toUpperCase()} (Â±0% tolerance)`; let actual_result = 'Worker Nodes: Not found'; if (clusterStep.error) { return { status: 'fail', message: 'No response received from API', code: 'NO_RESPONSE', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes', expected_result, actual_result }; } const apiOutput = clusterStep.data; let actualWorkerCount = null; let actualNodeType = null; if (apiOutput.num_workers !== undefined && apiOutput.node_type_id) { actualWorkerCount = apiOutput.num_workers; actualNodeType = apiOutput.node_type_id; actual_result = `Worker Nodes: ${actualWorkerCount} x ${actualNodeType}`; } else if (apiOutput.autoscale && apiOutput.autoscale.min_workers !== undefined && apiOutput.node_type_id) { actualWorkerCount = apiOutput.autoscale.min_workers; actualNodeType = apiOutput.node_type_id; actual_result = `Worker Nodes: ${actualWorkerCount} x ${actualNodeType}`; } if (actualWorkerCount !== null && actualNodeType !== null) { const requiredNodeType = ((typeof variables !== 'undefined' && variables.iq_104_1_node_type) || 'E32ds v5').toLowerCase(); const requiredWorkerCount = (typeof variables !== 'undefined' && variables.iq_104_1_worker_count) || 8; const nodeTypeMatches = actualNodeType.toLowerCase().includes(requiredNodeType); const workerCountMatches = actualWorkerCount === requiredWorkerCount; if (nodeTypeMatches && workerCountMatches) { return { status: 'pass', message: `At least one cluster has the required ${requiredWorkerCount} x ${requiredNodeType} worker nodes`, code: 'CORRECT_WORKER_CONFIGURATION', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes', expected_result, actual_result }; } else { return { status: 'fail', message: `Cluster worker configuration does not meet requirements: Node type is ${actualNodeType}; Worker count is ${actualWorkerCount} instead of ${requiredWorkerCount};`, code: 'INCORRECT_WORKER_CONFIGURATION', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes', expected_result, actual_result }; } } return { status: 'fail', message: 'Cluster response is missing node type or worker count information', code: 'MISSING_CLUSTER_INFO', test_id: 'IQ-104-1', title: 'Worker Nodes', expected_result, actual_result }; }
manual_procedure:
# Worker node check
databricks clusters get --cluster-id <id> | jq '.num_workers, .node_type_id'
